TypeSignature.Value: public class ErrorProvider : System.ComponentModel.Component, System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ErrorProvider extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class ErrorProvider Inherits Component Implements IExtenderProvider, ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 提供用來表示表單上之控制項具有相關錯誤的使用者介面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for indicating that a control on a form has an error associated with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的簡易機制，表示使用者在表單上的控制項有與其相關聯的錯誤。 presents a simple mechanism for indicating to the end user that a control on a form has an error associated with it. 如果指定控制項的錯誤描述字串，則圖示會出現在控制項旁邊。If an error description string is specified for the control, an icon appears next to the control. 圖示閃爍的指定方式，在所指定的速度。The icon flashes in the manner specified by , at the rate specified by . 當滑鼠停留在圖示時，工具提示會出現顯示錯誤描述字串。When the mouse hovers over the icon, a ToolTip appears showing the error description string. 通常，您會使用中具有資料繫結控制項產生關聯。Typically, you use in association with data-bound controls. 當使用使用資料繫結的控制項，您必須指定，建構函式中，或藉由設定屬性。When using with data-bound controls, you must specify the , either in the constructor or by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 元件不支援內建的協助工具用戶端。The component does not provide built-in support for accessibility clients. 若要使用此元件時，讓您的應用程式可存取，您必須提供其他可存取回應機制。To make your application accessible when using this component, you must provide an additional, accessible feedback mechanism. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來通知使用者的資料項目錯誤的類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立包含控制項，控制項和控制每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 此範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用和屬性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control’s event, depending upon the content in the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CPP/errorproviderexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CS/errorproviderexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/VB/errorproviderexample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用與和表示使用者的資料錯誤。The following code example shows how to use the with a and to indicate a data error to the user. [!code-cpp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 錯誤圖示閃爍指定的速率。The error icon flashes at the specified rate. 值為零集至。A value of zero sets to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來通知使用者的資料項目錯誤的類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立包含控制項，控制項和控制每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 此範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用和屬性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以附加到控制項的資料來源，且您想要監視的錯誤。The is a data source that you can attach to a control and that you want to monitor for errors. 可以將實作的任何集合設。 can be set to any collection that implements . 若要避免在執行階段時變更可能會發生衝突和，您應該使用而不是設定和個別。To avoid conflicts at run time that can occur when changing and , you should use instead of setting and individually. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用與和表示使用者的資料錯誤。The following code example shows how to use the with a and to indicate a data error to the user. 此程式碼假設您已建立並填入名為`dataSet1`包含名為`dataTable1`。This code assumes you have created and populated a named `dataSet1` containing a named `dataTable1`. 當您繫結至這類控制項控制，透過指定的錯誤物件會顯示錯誤圖像 （glyph） 中為控制項。When you bind the to a control such as the control, errors specified through objects appear as error glyphs in the control. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，請先開啟檔案對話方塊中檢查錯誤。The following code example uses the method to check for an error before opening a file dialog box. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`TextBox1`、名為`OpenFileDialog1`，名為按鈕`Button1`，和名為`ErrorProvider1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `TextBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, a button named `Button1`, and an named `ErrorProvider1`. 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetIconPadding(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control) cil managed

param.name: control
param.span: 要為其取得填補的控制項。

span.span: The control to get the padding for.

summary.span: 傳回錯誤圖示旁邊留下的額外空間數量。

span.span: Returns the amount of extra space to leave next to the error icon.

returns.span: 圖示和控制項之間留下的像素數。

span.span: The number of pixels to leave between the icon and the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 填補值時，才需要額外的空間有必要時讓許多圖示通常會有中央的影像，周圍的額外空間。Many icons typically have extra space around their central images, so the padding value is only necessary if additional space is necessary. 填補值可以是正數或負數。Padding values can be positive or negative. 負值會導致重疊的邊緣的圖示。Negative values cause the icon to overlap the edge of the control. 預設圖示填補為 0。The default icon padding is 0.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Icon ^ Icon { System::Drawing::Icon ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Icon ^ value); };

summary.span: 當控制項已經設定有錯誤描述字串時，取得或設定控制項旁邊顯示的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that is displayed next to a control when an error description string has been set for the control.
An that signals an error has occurred.

value.span: 預設圖示是由具有紅色背景的圓形中的驚嘆號組成。

span.span: The default icon consists of an exclamation point in a circle with a red background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為獲得最佳結果，使用大小為 16 x 16 像素為單位的圖示。For best results, use an icon of the size 16 x 16 pixels. 指定的圖示會調整大小是 16 x 16 像素為單位，如有必要。Specified icons are resized to be 16 x 16 pixels, if necessary.

span.span: The assigned value of the is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRightToLeftChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnRightToLeftChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool RightToLeft { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property RightToLeft As Boolean
public: virtual property bool RightToLeft { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在支援由右至左字型的地區設定 (Locale) 中使用元件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the component is used in a locale that supports right-to-left fonts.

value.span: 如果在由右至左的地區設定中使用元件，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the component is used in a right-to-left locale; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為 true，錯誤圖示會顯示針對關聯控制項的左邊和工具提示文字會顯示在從右至左的順序。When this property is set to true, the error icon appears to the left of the associated control and the ToolTip text is displayed in right-to-left order.

summary.span: 當 屬性值變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the property changes value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ErrorProvider1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ErrorProvider1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#382](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#382)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#382](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#382)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetError (System.Windows.Forms.Control control, string value);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetError(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control, string value) cil managed
public: void SetError(System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ control, System::String ^ value);

param.name: control
param.span: 要為其設定錯誤描述字串的控制項。

span.span: The control to set the error description string for.

param.name: value
param.span: 用以移除錯誤的錯誤描述字串，或是 或 。

span.span: The error description string, or or to remove the error.

summary.span: 設定指定控制項的錯誤描述字串。

span.span: Sets the error description string for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果長度`value`大於零，則會顯示錯誤圖示，而且錯誤圖示的工具提示的錯誤描述文字。If the length of `value` is greater than zero, then the error icon is displayed, and the ToolTip for the error icon is the error description text. 如果長度為零或`value`是`null`，隱藏錯誤圖示。If the length is zero or `value` is `null`, the error icon is hidden. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來通知使用者的資料項目錯誤的類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立包含控制項，控制項和控制每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 此範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用和屬性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CPP/errorproviderexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CS/errorproviderexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/VB/errorproviderexample.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

span.span: Sets the location where the error icon should be placed in relation to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖示的最終位置是由圖示填補值修改。The final placement of the icon is modified by the icon padding values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來通知使用者的資料項目錯誤的類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立包含控制項，控制項和控制每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 此範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用和屬性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CPP/errorproviderexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CS/errorproviderexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/VB/errorproviderexample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIconPadding (System.Windows.Forms.Control control, int padding);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetIconPadding(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control, int32 padding) cil managed

param.name: control
param.span: 要為其設定邊框間距的「控制項」。

span.span: The control to set the padding for.

param.name: padding
param.span: 圖示和「控制項」之間新增的像素數。

span.span: The number of pixels to add between the icon and the control.

summary.span: 設定指定控制項和錯誤圖示之間留下的額外空間數量。

span.span: Sets the amount of extra space to leave between the specified control and the error icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多圖示通常會有多餘的空間，周圍中央的影像，因此需要額外的空間時，才需要填補值。Many icons typically have extra space around their central images, so the padding value is only necessary when additional space is necessary. 填補值可以是正數或負數。Padding values can be positive or negative. 負值會導致重疊的邊緣的圖示。Negative values cause the icon to overlap the edge of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來通知使用者的資料項目錯誤的類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 此範例會建立包含控制項，控制項和控制每個驗證其內容，和每個控制項。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 此範例會設定錯誤圖示選項使用和屬性和和方法。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 方法期間會呼叫使用或不適當的錯誤文字控制項的事件，控制項中的內容而定。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CPP/errorproviderexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CS/errorproviderexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/VB/errorproviderexample.vb#1)]
